column1: Yazman (Urdu: تحصیل یزمان‎) is a tehsil located in Bahawalpur District
column3: Pakistan. The city of Yazman is the headquarters of the tehsil which is administratively subdivided into 18 Union Councils.Villages in the area include Chak No 113/DNB and Chak No 108/DNB. Chak 108/DNB has a Governmental Primary School and a private school named as Piyaam E Sahar Public School funded by an NGO named as PEF.
